content.prompt: Assuming a negligible pressure potential, which of the following best predicts the net movement of the small diffusible solutes and water in the second experiment (Table 2) ?

choices.label: Small diffusible solutes will diffuse into the grape cells, followed by water.
Small diffusible solutes will diffuse out of the grape cells and water will diffuse into the cells.
Small diffusible solutes will diffuse out of the grape cells, followed by water.
Small diffusible solutes will diffuse into the grape cells and water will diffuse out of the cells.

skill.text: 3.B: State the null hypothesis or predict the results of an experiment.
